title: Did Trump Try To Deflect Attention From His COVID-19 Response by Criticizing Obama’s to H1N1?
subtitle: Within a year of the first confirmed H1N1 case in the U.S, more than 69 million people had been infected, resulting in more than 12,000 deaths.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: U.S. President Donald Trump tried to deflect attention from his response to the COVID-19 coronavirus pandemic by repeatedly comparing it to President Barack Obama's handling of the H1N1 pandemic.
